name: ❌As Long As It's Not Illegal🚭
description:
It's your last three days as a senior at Suncity high.  As your senior prank, you, along with the group of Senior elites, decide to use your influence to host a party amongst your class in the most illegal way.

Who's idea was this again?

There are 20+ unique characters in this story.

and 5 love interests, look! Here they go now!

 

Roxanne: You play as a  namable female main character, however, the story will sometimes shift into the eyes of the love interests as well as other characters. Choice-based game: This game is point-based the story branches down 5 different endings, there are even choices in-game that will affect your sense of fashion.  The full game will have 12 chapters as long as an Epilogue. Animation: There is a subtle movement within the environment you visit throughout the story to bring a bit of life into every scene. 

20+ CGs: A full gallery of beautiful art depicting specific points in the story.

Clothes: There are a lota fits in this game. looota fits, I believe the love interest each has at least 3 outfit changes or more, the MC (not me) has seven SEVEN!
  • If there are any errors with the project, feel free to inform me in the "Any trouble?" discussion.
  • Possible Trigger warnings: Suggested suicide, Self-harm, Partial nudity, Drugs, Crude humor.
  • Mature content: Strong language & depictions of violence, blood?!

❌   Blog   ❌       ❌   Twitter   ❌      ❌    Insta    ❌

The game is set to release in October 2022 -🍒
